# [[Pax Romana]] {{gloss|the long period of relative peace and minimal expansion by military force experienced by the Roman Empire between 27 BCE and 180 CE}}
types.html:
paix romaine f (uncountable)

  1. Pax Romana (the long period of relative peace and minimal expansion by military force experienced by the Roman Empire between 27 BCE and 180 CE)

title: paix romaine
